How to Buy Bitcoins with Credit Card or Debit Card

A few years ago it was not possible to buy bitcoin with a credit card or debit card. Today, a number of companies accept credit card payments for bitcoin. Buying bitcoin with a debit card or credit card is a good option if you need a small amount of bitcoin or need bitcoin fast. However, buying with a credit/debit card usually comes with higher fees due to the high risk of fraud and higher processing fees.

Below you can find a list of companies that let you purchase bitcoin with a debit card or credit card. The availability of each service may vary by location. For example, many of the services below do not offer service to United States residents due to strict regulations.

Coinbase Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin with a 3D secure credit or debit card in Europe and the UK.

Buy Bitcoin

Circle Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoins online with a credit card or debit card instantly in the United States.

Buy Bitcoin

CoinMama Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin with a CC anywhere in the world besides the United States.

Buy Bitcoin

CoinCorner Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin in the UK and Europe with debit card or credit card.

Buy Bitcoin

Coinimal Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin in Europe with a Visa or Mastercard credit or debit card via Neteller.

Buy Bitcoin

Clevercoin Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin using a debit or credit card instantly in the UK or Europe.

Buy Bitcoin

Changetip Buy Bitcoin

Buy small amounts of bitcoin with a Visa or Mastercard debit/credit card.

Buy Bitcoin

CEX.io Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin with a Visa or Mastercard credit or debit card from nearly any country.

Buy Bitcoin

Purse.io Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin with a credit card or Amazon gift cards. Fee varies.

Buy Bitcoin

Now we're going to show step-by-step how to buy bitcoins at the exchanges listed above. If you simply want more information about the companies listed above, click here.

Buy Bitcoin with a Credit Card at Circle

Circle is the only exchange that lets U.S. customers buy bitcoin with a credit card or debit card. The only difference is debit card purchases are free, while credit card purchases come with a 3% fee.

Here’s a step-by-step guide on how to buy bitcoin instantly with a credit or debit card on Circle.

1. Create an Account on Circle

Once you create an account, confirm your personal details an login. Once you’ve logged in, continue to the next step.

2. Navigate to account settings

Navigate to the top right corner and enter your account settings.

3. Click on “CARDS AND BANKS”

4. Click on the green button “Add Account”

5. Select “Add Credit Card” or “Add Debit Card”

Remember that debit card purchases are free, while credit card purchases come with a 3% fee.

6. Add your card information

That’s it! Now you can buy bitcoin instantly with your credit or debit card on Circle.

Buy Bitcoin with Debit Card or Credit card at ChangeTip

Changetip is another great option to buy bitcoin instantly with a credit card in the United States. ChangeTip is a social tipping service, that lets people send small amounts of money to other people on the web. At ChangeTip you can buy up to $40 worth of bitcoin instantly with a credit or debit card. Here’s how:

1. Create an account on Changetip

You can login with Facebook, Twitter, or Reddit. Once you create an account, login.

2. Deposit

At the top of the page, click “Deposit” and then “Bitcoin”.

3. Add Card

Click “Add new card”.

4. Add Card Details

Fill in your credit/debit card information.

5. Buy Bitcoin

If you’re card was verified, you’ll now be able to select how much bitcoin you want to buy.

That’s it! Note that ChangeTip charges an 8.3% fee per purchase. Still, if you need bitcoin fast this is a good option.

More Information about Credit/Debit Card Exchanges

Coinbase Buy Bitcoin

Coinbase is the world's largest Bitcoin broker. At Coinbase you can buy up to €100 of bitcoin per day instantly with a 3D secure credit or debit card in Europe or the United Kingdom. Coinbase charges a flat 3% fee on all purchases via credit or debit card. Coinbase's 3% fee on credit card purchases is the lowest among Bitcoin brokers servicing European customers. If you buy more than $100 or €100 worth of bitcoin through this link you'll get $10 or €10 worth of bitcoin as a bonus (this can be done in multiple purchases, i.e. two purchases of €50 each).

Buy Bitcoin

Circle Buy Bitcoin

Circle lets you buy bitcoin online with a credit or debit card instantly with no fee. If you use a credit card you'll have to pay a 3% fee. Circle is currently only available in the United States. Purchasing through Circle is the only way to buy bitcoin with a debit card with no fees. You're initial buy limit is $300 of bitcoin per week although this limit can be raised if requested.

Buy Bitcoin

CoinMama Buy Bitcoin

CoinMama is a bitcoin broker that specializes in letting you purchase bitcoin with a debit or CC. You'll be charged a 10% fee due to the risks and processing fees that come with credit card payments. It's possible buy up to $520 worth of bitcoin per day. After your account is verified and a purchase is made you will receive your bitcoin within a few hours. Use this link to get 5% off your order. CoinMama is not available to residents of the United States.

Buy Bitcoin

Coinimal Buy Bitcoin

Coinimal is a Bitcoin broker located in Austria. You can purchase bitcoin with a CC indirectly via NETELLER for a 7% fee. Coinimal is available to residents of the EU.

Buy Bitcoin

Clevercoin Buy Bitcoin

Clevercoin is a Bitcoin broker located in France. Residents of Europe can purchase bitcoin with a credit card for a 3.6% fee plus €0.30. Initial limit is €250 per day. Your limit is increased the more you purchase, and can reach €2,500 per day.

Buy Bitcoin

Changetip Buy Bitcoin

Changetip lets you buy up to $40 worth of bitcoin with a Visa or Mastercard credit/debit card. You'll need to connect a Facebook, Twitter, Reddit or GitHub account. It may take up to 24 hours to get your bitcoin with your first purchase. U.S. residents only.

Buy Bitcoin

CEX.io Buy Bitcoin

CEX.io lets you buy bitcoin with a credit or debit card, and your bitcoin will be available immediately. CEX.io works in the United States, Europe, and some countries in South America.

Buy Bitcoin

Purse.io Buy Bitcoin

With Purse.io you purchase bitcoin with a CC but not directly. Purse.io connects you with a buyer who wants to make a purchase on Amazon. You use your credit card or debit card to order items from the buyer's Amazon wish list. When the items have been delivered to the buyer, you are given bitcoin equivalent to the value of the items you ordered for the buyer. Purse.io is available in the United States, Canada, Japan, Brazil, France, Italy, Spain, China, and India.

Buy Bitcoin

Trucoin Buy Bitcoin

Trucoin lets you buy bitcoin with a Visa or Mastercard credit card in 30 U.S. states. Your bitcoin will be delivered instantly. Available in Alabama, Arizona, Arkansas, American Samoa, Connecticut, Washington D.C., Florida, Georgia, Idaho, Kansas, Kentucky, Maine, Massachusetts, Michigan, Minnesota, Mississippi, Montana, Nebraska, New Jersey, New Mexico, North Dakota, Oregon, Rhode Island, South Carolina, South Dakota, Texas, Wake Island, West Virginia, and Wyoming.

Buy Bitcoin

Coinhouse Buy Bitcoin

Citizens of France can buy bitcoin with a 3D secure credit or debit card at Coinhouse. The fees range from 6-10% depending on your total buy volume. Learn more in our Coinhouse review.

Buy Bitcoin

247Exchange Buy Bitcoin

247Exchange lets you buy bitcoin with a credit or debit card. There's a 7% fee on each purchase of bitcoin; 4% to cover the credit card processing fees, and 3% more as a service fee. 247Exchange is not available to residents of the United States.

Buy Bitcoin

Frequently Asked Questions

What are risks are involved buying bitcoins with credit card?

First of all, make sure the company you're buying for has a good reputation and is regulated. It's possible that sketchy companies selling bitcoins may be collecting CC information and could possibly scam you later.

Some users have reported cash advanced fees, so be sure to understand how your CC company handles the purchase of bitcoins.

What are the benefits and advantages?

It can be easy to get bitcoins fast if purchasing with a debit/credit card. Since most people understand how to shop online using credit and debit cards, it may be easier for less technical buyers to use credit cards to purchase bitcoins.

What are the disadvantages?

It's hard to buy large amounts of bitcoins with a CC or DC. Also, the fees are higher due to the risk of fraud and scams.

If none of the companies above suit your needs, try buying bitcoin with cash, SEPA transfer, NETELLER, or Skrill. To find more places to buy bitcoin in your country use our country index.

Note: Buy bitcoin at your own risk. We only recommend companies we find and can't guarantee the security of your funds. We recommend buying bitcoin and immediately moving it to a wallet you own.
